A4.text: Its primary tenant is 참고 the San Jose Sharks of the National Hockey League, for which the arena has earned the nickname 'The Shark Tank'.

A5.text: SAP Center hosted games 3, 4, and 6 of the 2016 Stanley Cup Finals in the Sharks' first appearance in franchise history.
